Class Ballot

java.lang.Object
Ballot
public class Ballot
extends Object
Ballot - Creates objects representing a single ballot in the form of an ArrayList of Candidates and allows modification of candidates on the ballot.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected ArrayList<Candidate> candidates
    An ArrayList of type Candidates to later be added to the ballot
    protected int length
    the length of the ArrayList of candidates (the number of candidates)
    protected String officeName
    name of the office that is up for a vote

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Ballot​(String officeName)
    Contructs a single Ballot composed of an ArrayList of type Candidate.

  • Method Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Ballot

      public Ballot​(String officeName)
      Contructs a single Ballot composed of an ArrayList of type Candidate.
      Parameters:
      officeName - assigns the name of the office that is up for a vote

  • Method Details

    • getOfficeName

      public String getOfficeName()
      Returns:
      the office name that is up for vote

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      Returns:
      the current length of the ballot in reference to the number of Candidates

    • addCandidate

      public void addCandidate​(Candidate c)
      Adds the given candidate to the arraylist of candidates for this particular ballot. Prints out the candidate is already on the ballot if the candidate already exists in list.
      Parameters:
      c - the candidate to be added to the arraylist of Candidates

    • getCandidates

      public ArrayList<Candidate> getCandidates()
      Returns:
      the arraylist of candidates on this particular Ballot

    • getCandidate

      public Candidate getCandidate​(int index)
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the candidate that is trying to be reached
      Returns:
      a specific candidate within the arrayList on this particular Ballot

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a well-formatted snapshot of the ballot including the officeName and candidates
